titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Sir Harford Jones [Brydges], Baronet, HM Envoy and Minister Plenipotentiary at the Court of Persia

mods.abstract: The letter concerns the removal of the Residency from the old factory; currently the Residency is accommodated in tents. It further explains that the Governor of Bushire, Mahomed Jaffer Khan [Muḥammad Ja‘afar Khān], is repairing a town house to a suitable state for the Acting Resident to move into, as per the orders of Ḥusayn ‘Alī Mirzā, the Prince at Shiraz.
